TopicTitle: Don't view the result until you vote; vote with your first thought.

Articles.Content:
Don't think too much. Vote with your first thought.

See what pattern will finally come out...

A psychological experiment maybe...

Edited July 10, 2013 by Cesrate
Psychological test, you say?
sorry, I don't do blind votes. I'd like to know what I'm voting on

wait, wha...

...

>>>>
The results are surprising so far.

The results are surprising so far.

I agree, "Choose this" are still leading than the other choices.
Well, damn, i picked the same thing as most others.

sorry, I don't do blind votes. I'd like to know what I'm voting on

Don't break the rule!

All those people who vote for Choose this are retarded. The only right answer is clearly Choose this. I could understand people who vote for Choose this or Choose this, but picking Choose this when there is Choose this and even Choose this as alternatives is simply unforgivable. I guess some people are just incapable of objective thought and understanding rational arguments.

Edited July 9, 2013 by Crush

The results are surprising so far.

Strange preference. Maybe we should wait for more votes.

Interesting.

Options in odd number except 1, i.e. 3,5,7,9 seems to be avoided.

6 and 8 are very popular.

Not sure if there's too much personal thought involved. Maybe lots of people just select their lucky number? Not sure, if so 7 should also be popular according to a previous survey.
Choose this is now tied with Choose this. Well that was kinda weird...
I think Choose This is going to win the vote, but maybe Choose This will as well. We will have to see

Yay! I was the last one to pick the only option that had 0 votes. If I'd randomly clicked one lower, I'd have been in the majority but instead I'm a trailblazer!

I liked "Choose this" back before it was cool.

Yay! I was the last one to pick the only option that had 0 votes. If I'd randomly clicked one lower, I'd have been in the majority but instead I'm a trailblazer!

I liked "Choose this" back before it was cool.

+1 for the hipster Choose This.

Gonna become a trend.

I liked "Choose this" back before it was cool.

Don't you mean:

I chose "Choose this" before it was chosen.

Don't you mean:

I chose "Choose this" before it was chosen.

Nobody choosed anything!

Nobody choosed anything!

I didn't chose "Choose this". "Choose this" chose me.
After 38 votes, the result doesn't really say much and is really kinda bizarre. I attempted to choose an option that would be the least picked - and I did - by chance - or was it by chance?

I tried to reproduce the experiment in another forum and got less conclusive results, but there was also a slight preference for the area 6-8.

http://forums.themanaworld.org/viewtopic.php?f=5&t=17543

Edited July 10, 2013 by Crush
The one I chose was second at the time of my choosing, which means I'm a sherson etc.

The one I chose was second at the time of my choosing, which means I'm a sherson etc.

As with me.

58 votes so far. Choose this and Choose This are tied for first. Choose this and Choose This are tied for second (Strange). And Choose this is falling behind with only 2 votes.

I personally think Choose this is the best though.

While it is interesting it's not (completely) surprising. The middle and endpoints are too "nonrandom" for people, as are the 1/3 and 2/3 points. I'm not sure why more people prefer the bottom of the poll over the top, but I'm sure there's a reason. It could be as simple as we like larger numbers

I vaguely recall an experiment where, when asked to pick a random number between 1 and 10, people tended to pick 7.
Now my choice has entered a firm first place!
